extensionAttribute.description:
Extension attribute to report inventory information about whether or not a macOS Catalina+ device has been Bootstrapped. https://travellingtechguy.blog/jamf-pro-extension-attribute-bootstrap/
jfilice@csumb.edu: Modified 2022/12/14
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/bash # very simple Extension Attribute to collect Bootstrap information # copy script to an EA in Jamf Pro Settings -> Computer -> Extension Attribute # EA input type: script # 28th of January 2020 - By Travelling Tech Guy # https://travellingtechguy.blog bootstrap=$(profiles status -type bootstraptoken) if [[ $bootstrap == *"supported on server: YES"* ]]; then if [[ $bootstrap == *"escrowed to server: YES"* ]]; then echo "YES, Bootstrap escrowed" result="YES" else echo "NO, Bootstrap not escrowed" result="NO" fi else echo "Bootstrap token not supported on server" result="NOT SUPPORTED" fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
